course_title: Special Topics: Human Health &the Applied Arts
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 12 / Seats Avail: 7Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Same as HLTH 385 1)
The arts and creativity embody human experience and offer various modes of expression through which we explore our place in the world, heal from hardship, and enhance our overall wellness. This course will provide an overview of the field of creative arts therapy, including drama therapy, dance/movement therapy, art therapy, music therapy, and poetry therapy. Students will hear from professionals in the field and engage in each method experientially and through discussion.
course_description: Individual courses designed to introduce students to special topics in theater.
